docs.snippet: HAVANA, Jan. 22 (UPI)-- Premier Fidel Castro declared tonight that the American foreign ministers' conference at Punta del Este, Uruguay, was a "battle between imperialism and Cuba."
docs.lead_paragraph: HAVANA, Jan. 22 (UPI)-- Premier Fidel Castro declared tonight that the American foreign ministers' conference at Punta del Este, Uruguay, was a "battle between imperialism and Cuba."
docs.abstract: Castro calls Conf a battle between Cuba and imperialism, s, Havana; postpones Havana rally aimed at replying to Conf to Feb; says Cuba is only Latin-Amer nation strong enough to save itself from imperialism

headline.main: Castro Terms Parley a Battle Between Imperialism and Cuba; Assembly Is Postponed Calls Latins Defenseless

docs.snippet: As the conference in Punta del Este, Uruguay, was being prepared, and during these first confused days, Americans must have been wondering sourly why Mexico is so firmly opposed to any action against Cuba.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Jan. 23--Forty African and Asian states proposed today that the General Assembly call on Portugal to "desist forthwith from repressive measures against the people of Angola" and release all political prisoners immediately.

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, Jan. 24--Seven LatinAmerican countries, including the largest ones, issued a memorandum today denouncing "the incompatibility between the present regime in Cuba and the inter-American system." But they opposed sanctions.
